title: One Piece Episode #547 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A review of episode 547 that discusses the detailed backstory to Fish-Man Island and its importance to the series, noting that while the information is useful and important, it could use some compression.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episode 547 and earlier Fish-Man Island arc episodes

title: Sam's Piece: Ten of the Most Well-Made 'One Piece' Episodes
author: The One Piece Podcast
description: An editorial piece highlighting ten of the most well-made One Piece episodes, including episode 547. The reviewer praises the Fishman Island arc's color palette and specifically mentions that both King Neptune and Jinbe's crying scenes are incredibly tender in animation with spectacular music choices. States if they were to re-cut the show Dragon Ball Kai style, 547 is an episode they hope they wouldn't remove a single frame from.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for various arcs throughout One Piece

title: NAMI FORGIVES JIMBEI - One Piece Episode 546 and 547 - Rich Reaction
author: Rich Reaction
description: A reaction video covering episodes 546 and 547 of One Piece, focusing on the emotional moment when Nami forgives Jinbe despite her traumatic history with Arlong.

title: 'One Piece': Why Does Jinbe Say Sorry To Nami? What Was Jinbei's Relationship With Arlong?
author: First Curiosity
description: An article explaining the context behind Jinbe's apology to Nami in episode 547, detailing his past relationship with Arlong and why he feels responsible for the pain Arlong caused Nami.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains background information about Arlong and Jinbe from earlier arcs

title: 547-548: 'Back to the Present: Hordy Makes a Move' and 'The Kingdom in Shock! An Order to Execute Neptune Issued!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A first-time watcher's blog covering episodes 547-548, providing fresh perspective on the episodes' events. The viewer theorizes about Hody Jones being Otohime's real assassin and discusses the emotional impact of Nami's forgiveness.

title: (early) One Piece Episode 545-547 REACTION
author: RuffSenpai
description: A Patreon-exclusive early access reaction video covering episodes 545-547 of One Piece, including the Nami forgiveness scene and Hody's broadcast.
